room_title: Escape room "Sasquatch" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
room_address: 2076 West Park Place Blvd Stone Mountain, GA 30087
room_description:
You and your friends set out to go camping one weekend in a very remote area. Your path is blocked by a fallen tree, and the night is approaching fast. The local ranger station tells you that there is a cabin where you could spend the night.
When you arrive, the door is wide open and the lights are on. Suddenly you hear strange howls and growls in the woods behind you, so you rush into the cabin and slam the door behind you. Can you solve the mysteries you find inside before the mythical creature is able to reach you?
